BEEN HANGING ON TO. I'M GIVING IT TO EDDIE.
>> Jeff: USING TWO IDOLS TO BLIND SIDE PHILLIP.
THE TRIBE HAS SPOKEN. >> THANK YOU.

MAJORITY ALLIANCE BEGAN TO TARGET EACH OTHER.
>> WHO DO YOU THINK SHOULD GO HOME?
BRENDA OR DAWN? >> I THINK TODAY IS THE
BEGINNING OF THE END FOR ALLIANCE OF SIX.

>> WHAT? >> Jeff: AND WITH AN IDOL IN HER

FEEL LIKE THAT DOORS ARE CLOSED AND I THINK I'M PRETTY MUCH A
